SEARCH
Package gw.api.contact

Interface AddressBookMatch

All Known Subinterfaces:
DuplicateContactMatch
All Known Implementing Classes:
DuplicateContactMatchImpl
public interface AddressBookMatch
This is a special interface that is used by the ContactMatchWorksheet in the processes of creating a contact in addressbook or when linking a contact to the addressbook.

It is a common interface of both PotentialMatches and DefinitiveMatch.

    • canDelete

      boolean canDelete()

    • createInAddressBook

      void createInAddressBook(boolean onlyPrimaryRelationships)
      Creates the local Contact in the Address Book.
      Parameters:
      onlyPrimaryRelationships - if true, when creating the contact in AddressBook, only add the primary relationships. Primary relationships are defined in contact-sync-config.xml.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if canCreateInAddressBook() returns false.
      See Also:
      • Contact.createInAddressBook(boolean)

    • isLinking

      boolean isLinking()
      Determines whether this match object was created as a result of attempting to link a contact to the Address Book.

    • isCreating

      boolean isCreating()
      Determines whether this match object was created as a result of attempting to create an Address Book entry.

      IEntityType getRootContactType()
      Get the type of the root contact that is trying to match.
